name: Nebula
text: Combat Protocols - Forced Response: After your turn begins, resolve the "Special" ability on each [[technique]] upgrade you control, then discard each [[technique]] upgrade resolved this way.

name: Nebula
text: Cybernetic Upgrades - Response: After you play a [[technique]] upgrade, draw 2 cards. (Limit once per round.)

name: Gamora
text: Response: After you play Gamora, choose a [[technique]] upgrade you control, then resolve its "Special" ability.

name: Nebula's Ship
text: Resource: Exhaust Nebula's Ship -> generate a [wild] resource.

name: Cutthroat Amibition
text: While Nebula is in hero form, her attacks gain piercing and overkill. Special (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Evasive Maneuvering
text: While in hero form, Nebula ignores the guard keyword, the patrol keyword, and the crisis icon. Special : Choose to either sun or confuse an enemy.

name: Unyielding Persistence
text: While in hero form, Nebula gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and gains salwart. Special : Give Nebula a tough status card.

name: Weapons Master
text: While in hero form, Nebula gains retaliate 1. Special (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy.

name: Wide Stance
text: While Nebula is in hero form, reduce the amount of damage she takes from each attack by 1. Special : Look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Discard 1 and put the others back in any order.

name: Combat Ready
text: Alter-Ego Action: Choose one: Shuffle up to 2 [[technique]] upgrades from your discard pile into your deck. Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a [[technique]] upgrade. Put that upgrade into play, then resolve its "Special" ability.

name: Lethal Intent
text: Hero Action: Choose up to X [[technique]] upgrades you control. Resolve each of their "Special" abilities (in the order of your choice).

name: Eros
text: Response: After you play Eros from your hand, confuse a minion for each [mental] resource you used to pay for him.

name: Wraith
text: Hero Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, exhaust Wraith and deal 1 damage to him -> cancel that card's "Boost" effect.

name: Venom
text: While there is no threat on the main scheme, reduce all consequential damage Venom takes by 1.

name: Justice Served
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After you thwart and remove the last threat from a scheme, discard Justice Served -> ready your hero.

name: One Way or Another
text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Search the encounter deck for a side scheme. Reveal that side scheme -> draw 3 cards (shuffle the encounter deck).

name: Brains over Brawn
text: Hero Response (attack): After your hero makes a basic thwart, deal damage to an enemy equal to your hero's THW.

name: Daughters of Thanos
text: Team-Up (Gamora and Nebula). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Draw 3 cards.

name: Energy Spear
text:
Attach to a [[guardian]] ally. Max 1 per ally.
 Attached ally gets +2 ATK and gains piercing.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 [[team]] card per player. If each of your characters has the [[guardian]] trait, this card gains: "Response: After you play an upgrade on an ally, draw 1 card."

name: Defensive Training
text: Max 2 per deck. Uses (2 training counters). Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust this card and remove 1 training counter from this -> choose a Protection (green) event in your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Honorary Guardian
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait.
 Attach to a friendly character. Max 1 per character.
 Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[guardian]] trait.
